scripts.ml:prep:aug: npm run ml:clean-harvest && bash -lc '/mnt/d/guard_tos/.venv/bin/python scripts/prepare_datasets.py --output data/clauses.jsonl --augment data/harvested_class_action.cleaned.jsonl'
scripts.ml:train: bash -lc '/mnt/d/guard_tos/.venv/bin/python scripts/train_tfidf_logreg.py --input data/clauses.jsonl --output src/data/dictionaries/tfidf_logreg_v2.json --labels ARBITRATION CLASS_ACTION_WAIVER LIABILITY_LIMITATION UNILATERAL_CHANGES'
scripts.ml:calibrate: bash -lc '/mnt/d/guard_tos/.venv/bin/python scripts/calibrate_thresholds.py --data data/clauses.jsonl --model src/data/dictionaries/tfidf_logreg_v2.json --labels ARBITRATION CLASS_ACTION_WAIVER LIABILITY_LIMITATION UNILATERAL_CHANGES --out-json data/threshold_suggestions.json --out-md docs/analysis/model-calibration.md'
scripts.ml:full: npm run ml:prep && npm run ml:train && npm run ml:calibrate
scripts.ml:full:sync: npm run ml:download && npm run ml:prep:train:calibrate && npm run ml:sync-thresholds && npm run ml:smoke
scripts.ml:full:offhub: npm run ml:prep:offhub && npm run ml:train && npm run ml:calibrate && npm run ml:sync-thresholds && npm run ml:smoke
scripts.ml:full:aug: npm run ml:prep:aug && npm run ml:train && npm run ml:calibrate
scripts.ml:prep:train:calibrate: npm run ml:prep && npm run ml:train && npm run ml:calibrate
scripts.ml:corpus:build:dr: bash -lc "/mnt/d/guard_tos/.venv/bin/python scripts/corpus/build_category_dataset.py --category dispute_resolution --input data/clauses.jsonl --output-dir data/processed/dispute_resolution/v$(date +%Y.%m.%d) --sources harvested_clauses"
